R

refresh() - Method in class fr.ubordeaux.simpleUI.Arena
Cleans the Arena and redraws all the items of the Collection in the order of iteration of this last
run(Collection<I>, ItemManager<I>, ApplicationRunnable<I>) - Static method in class fr.ubordeaux.simpleUI.Application
Main routine in order to create an area for painting elements of type I.
run(Arena<I>, Collection<I>) - Method in interface fr.ubordeaux.simpleUI.ApplicationRunnable
called by Application as the main routine of this last which aims is to handle the Arena and its Collection of items.
run(TimerTask) - Method in interface fr.ubordeaux.simpleUI.TimerRunnable
called by Application in its timer method at a fixed delay.
Run - Class in simpleUIApp.Controller
The run class.
Run(int, int) - Constructor for class simpleUIApp.Controller.Run
The constructor of run.
run(Arena<Item>, Collection<Item>) - Method in class simpleUIApp.Controller.Run
The implemented method from the ApplicationRunnable class.
